title: Basic Queries - Family Relationships
description:
Simple parent-child relationships. Try queries like:
• parent(tom, bob)
• parent(tom, X)

title: Facts and Rules - Grandparents & Ancestors
description:
Rule definitions and recursion. Try queries like:
• grandparent(tom, ann)
• ancestor(tom, X)
• sibling(bob, X)

title: Dynamic Assertions - Game State
description:
Runtime fact management with dynamic predicates.
Facts are added/modified/removed at runtime.

title: Complex Queries - Combat System
description:
Game mechanics with calculations. Try queries like:
• damage(sword, orc, D)
• one_shot_kill(axe, goblin)
• enemy(X, HP, _, _)

title: Pathfinding - Graph Traversal
description:
Find paths between nodes with cycle detection. Try:
• path(a, f, Path, Cost)
• connected(a, X, C)

title: AI Behavior - Decision Making
description:
AI state transitions based on conditions. Try:
• decide_action(Action, 15, 8)
• decide_action(Action, 50, 2)
